         border: "1px solid #ccc",
         position: "relative", // For absolute positioning of the button
       }}
     >
-      <TextField
-        id="message-input"
-        label="Type your message"

+<TextField
+  id="message-input"
+  label="Type your message"
+  variant="outlined"
+  multiline
+  maxRows={4}
+  value={content}
+  onChange={(e) => setContent(e.target.value)}
+  onKeyPress={(e) => {
+    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {  // Prevents a new line when Shift+Enter is not pressed
+      e.preventDefault();  // Prevents the default action of inserting a new line
+      if (content.trim()) {  // Checks if the input is not just empty spaces
+        handleSubmit(e);  // Triggers form submission
+      }
+    }
+  }}
+  autoFocus
+  fullWidth
+  style={{ marginRight: "48px" }}
+/>
       <IconButton
         type="submit"
         color="primary"
         aria-label="send"

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content: import { Button, TextArea } from '@apideck/components' import { useState } from 'react' import { useMessages } from 'utils/useMessages' const MessageForm = () => { const [content, setContent] = useState('') const { addMessage } = useMessages() const handleSubmit = async (e: any) => { e?.preventDefault() addMessage(content) setContent('') } return (
